===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くさりふんどう|鎖|tr1=kusari|t1=chain|分銅|tr2=fundō|t2=weight}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[kɯᵝsa̠ɾi ɸɯ̃ᵝɴdo̞ː]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|くさり ふんどう}}

# a [[chain]] with a [[weight]] on one or both ends, such as might be used on a [[pulley]] to help lift loads
# {{lb|ja|weaponry|sort=くさりふんどう}} a [[Japanese]] [[martial art]]s [[chain]] [[weapon]], consisting of or based on such a weighted chain
